creditline: Gift of Joanne Leonard in memory and honor of Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg, and in honor of her daughter, Jane C. Ginsburg, and Joanne's daughter, Julia M. Leonard
description: black and white image of a young girl with long dark hair holding a baby in a bathroom
inscription: on back in pencil and black ink: (crossed-out stamp, dimensions and various notes)
markings: on back on label: Joanne Leonard / 1319 Pomona Road / Ann Arbor, Michigan 48103 | on back stamped in purple: JOANNE / LEONARD / 1319 / POMONA ROAD / ANN ARBOR / MICHIGAN / 48103
signed: on back in pencil: Joanne Leonard
title: Julia with neighbor, Rachel
